projects.name: Database Migration Tool
achievements: Built RESTful API using Azure Data Movement Library and parallelized chunked uploads to enable multi-terabyte data transfers from premium to cheaper storage, cutting storage costs by $60K annually
Developed file management UI and real-time dashboard using React.js and Material UI, utilizing custom data structures to efficiently track folders and contents
Built Jest/Testing Library suite with 90% coverage, reducing UI defects and shortening development time

projects.name: Enterprise Application Platform
achievements: Rewrote and consolidated multiple legacy Delphi applications into a single modular .NET Core backend with a React frontend reducing maintenance costs by 35%
Designed and optimized React UI with memoization, pagination, and a custom search engine, improving data retrieval efficiency and reducing load times by 30%
Automated file renaming, zipping, and server uploads with Python, cutting process time from 1 hour to 10 minutes and enabling quick data validation with custom optimized SQL queries

projects.name: Financial Trading System
achievements: Led 5-member team to develop trading system using .NET and MySQL
Built custom stored procedures for trade execution and portfolio tracking
Implemented JWT authentication for secure user access and authorization
Created an ML model for forecasting sales using Python, achieving 80% accuracy
Data Visualization using Power BI, creating interactive dashboards and reports that displayed key insights and trends for decision making
